rev.comment: Filling in 31 references using [[WP:REFLINKS|Reflinks]], [[WP:MOS|style]] fixes, incl. [[WP:MOSDATES|dates]], [[MOS:LINK]] and [[MOS:TEXT]]
[[:en:WP:CLEANER|WPCleaner]] (v1.09) Repaired link to disambiguation page - [[WP:DPL|(You can help)]] - [[Axis]], [[Pavle]], [[Servia]] / Fixed using [[WP:WCW]] - Title linked in text
expanded the metadata on the source, and removed the out of place [[Serbinum]] mention - the article clearly says it's just a theory and doesn't support it with evidence

Replacing Kara-Djordje_Petrovic.jpg with [[File:Karađorđe_Petrović,_by_Vladimir_Borovikovsky,_1816.jpg]] (by [[commons:User:Courcelles|Courcelles]] because: [[commons:Commons:File renaming|File renamed]]: proper name of the file).
In the link it is saying Serbs Catholics of Dalmatia...But when you go to that link it directs you to the Serbs Of Dubrovnik...There is no article about Serb Catholics in Dalmatia.Stop this nonsense
In the link it is saying Serbs Catholics of Dalmatia...But when you go to that link it directs you to the Serbs Of Dubrovnik...So i corrected that
sp, date & link fixes; unlinking common words using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
rm sentence that doesn't actually say anything.

/* Yugoslavia */ rm stuff out of the scope of this article and/or disputable among historians
/* Montenegro */ this is the article on Serbs
Montes Serrorum meant a mountain where the Goths took refuge, not a moutain range. Also, there is no link the Serbs.
clean up and general fixes, typos fixed: christianized → Christianized (3), protestants → Protestants using [[Project:AWB|AWB]] (7734)
/* Yugoslavia */ Fixing numbers and events to line up with those in Bosnian War, Croatian War of Independence, with ample sources
/* Croatia */ how sneaky....census results from independent Croatian state being used in Yugoslavia section. Find pre-1991 censuses
/* War in Bosnia */ citations for numbers needed

/* Genetics */ The section is about genetics of *Serbs*. Neither Serbia (SR in the image) is all composed of Serbs, nor Serbs live only in Serbia. So the image is not quite appropriate for this section. And what freaking manipulation??
